About.Paragraph1: I'm a web developer with working knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, React, and more. I'm currently looking for my first job in the industry and am eager to continue learning new technologies over time.
About.Paragraph2: I'm largely self-taught, and first taught myself HTML when I was 10 years old. It wasn't until 2017 that I started learning code again, starting first with freeCodeCamp before enrolling in nanodegree programs via Udacity.
About.Paragraph3: Since then I've continued to learn web development technologies, but have recently taken an interest in AI.
